Class DigitalClock

java.lang.Object
  DigitalClock

public class DigitalClock
extends java.lang.Object

A class for dealing with digital clocks, displaying time in terms of hours, minutes and seconds.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Eric Steegmans

Field Summary

Field Detail

MIN_SECONDS

public static final int MIN_SECONDS
Constants reflecting the smallest possible value, respectively the largest possible value for the seconds of a digital clock. The smallest possible value for the second of all digital clocks is set to 0. The largest possible value for the seconds of all digital clocks is set to 59.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAX_SECONDS

public static final int MAX_SECONDS
See Also:
Constant Field Values

DigitalClock

public DigitalClock(int hours,
                    int minutes,
                    int seconds)
Initialize this new digital clock with given hours, minutes and seconds.

Parameters:
hours - The hours for this new digital clock.
minutes - The minutes for this new digital clock.
seconds - The seconds for this new digital clock.

DigitalClock

public DigitalClock(int hours,
                    int minutes)
Initialize this new digital clock with given hours and minutes.

Parameters:
hours - The hours for this new digital clock.
minutes - The minutes for this new digital clock.

DigitalClock

public DigitalClock()
Initialize a new digital clock with hours, minutes and seconds set to their smallest possible values.

Method Detail

getHours

public int getHours()
Return the hours displayed by this digital clock.

getMinHours

public int getMinHours()
Return the smallest possible value for the hours of this digital clock.

Returns:
The smallest possible value for the hours of this digital clock is a non-negative value. | result >= 0

getMaxHours

public int getMaxHours()
Return the largest possible value for the hours of this digital clock.

Returns:
The largest possible value for the hours of this digital clock is not below the smallest possible value for the hours of this digital clock. | result >= getMinHours()

setHours

public void setHours(int hours)
Set the hours for this digital clock to the given hours.

Parameters:
hours - The new hours for this digital clock.

getMinMinutes

public static int getMinMinutes()
Return the smallest possible value for the minutes of all digital clocks.

Returns:
The smallest possible value for the minutes of all digital clocks is non-negative. | result >= 0

getMaxMinutes

public static int getMaxMinutes()
Return the largest possible value for the minutes of all digital clocks.

Returns:
The largest possible value for the minutes of all digital clocks is not below the smallest possible value for the minutes of all digital clocks. | result >= getMinMinutes()

displaysEarlierTimeThan

public boolean displaysEarlierTimeThan(DigitalClock other)
Check whether the time displayed by this digital clock is earlier than the time displayed by the other digital clock.

Parameters:
other - The clock to compare with.
Returns:
False if the other clock is not effective. | if (other == null) | then result == false

synchronizeWith

public void synchronizeWith(DigitalClock other)
Synchronize the time displayed by this digital clock with the time displayed by the given digital clock.

Parameters:
other - The digital clock to synchronize with.
